item.title: Register
item.description: Registration is currently closed to the public.

item.title: FAQ
item.description: General What is RastaLabs? When will it be ready? Registration How can I register? Is there a waiting list? What happens to idle users? What about backers? Access How can I access RastaLabs? Can I share my connection details? What is RastaLabs? RastaLabs is a penetration environmment, designed to simulate elements of a corporate network. When will it be ready? How long is a piece of string?

item.title: Progress Update
item.description: A brief update on progress with RastaLabs.

item.title: Contact
item.description:
If you wish to contact me regarding this project, please choose from the following options.

For general chit-chat:

  • @_RastaMouse on Twitter
  • #rastalabs on Freenode
  • RastaLabs on Slack

For reporting problems or suggestions/improvements:

  • https://github.com/rasta-mouse/rastalabs.net/issues

item.title: Introduction to RastaLabs
item.description: RastaLabs is a virtual environment, designed to simulate elements of a real-life corporate network. It’s primarily a Windows network, with other *nix systems, virtual firewalls, switches and possibly the odd IPS thrown in (under construction).
